--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 3/1/03 12:26:07 PM Central Standard Time, 
> cardhead649@y... writes:
> 
> 
> > > She cringed, then her optics went to Empath. "Come," nodding 
with 
> > her head. 
> > > "Seems that Even harmless old Decepticons are never trusted." 
she 
> > growled 
> > > with distaste.
> > 
> > Empath walks over to Maxima.  "No Decepticon is harmless."
> > 
> 
> She smirked, as she started to move away. "True. To some certain 
extent. For 
> the most part... there are only a couple of us... with no 
leader..." she 
> snorted. "We are like the old Cybertronians who waste away." It was 
more a 
> cover than the truth. Hopefully, Empath will understand this.

Empath understands all too well.  She realizes quickly something is 
shielding Maxima from her powers, and taps into the power of the Soul 
Orbs to force her way past the block.  She doesn't like what she 
sees, but walks with Maxima anyway, confident in her own ability to 
defend herself.  "You've been talking with Hydras, haven't you?"
